review:
Dear Mr.Gleeson, thanks for your feedback. We realize that this is a little awkward, because our menu is made on basis of classic cocktails and if previously you haven‚Äôt drank them you don‚Äôt know that they differs. Our main aim is to describe everything to our guests and to let only that drinks, which could make them happy and let em enjoy.  So, maybe due to workload our stuff haven‚Äôt described to you the specialty of our drinks, apologies. Hope, you will have one more opportunity to come to our bar and grab that drink, that pleases you. We‚Äôre waiting for you !
All the best wishes, t.c.p.
